data.lyric:
[ti:The Voice (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Durk]
[al:The Voice (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Voice (Explicit) - Lil Durk
[00:00.16]Lyrics by：Durk Banks/Joshua Samuel/John Balan/Braylen Rembert
[00:00.32]Composed by：Durk Banks/Joshua Samuel/John Balan/Braylen Rembert
[00:00.49]Turn me up Josh
[00:01.36]
[00:22.07]I was goin' through that pain alone
[00:24.09]I was goin' through that phase alone
[00:25.95]We all change you say I change alone
[00:28.08]Sleepless nights barely changin' clothes
[00:30.18]You know d**n right you was wrong
[00:33.52]I was tired they didn't realize
[00:36.23]Certain vibes it don't feel right
[00:39.05]Plenty nights got me traumatized
[00:41.72]Why they lie
[00:42.57]I do love my guys
[00:44.36]You lookin' crazy know the trenches raised me
[00:47.34]I'm Durkio but I'm Chicago JAY-Z
[00:50.25]And I was scared how that money made me
[00:52.75]I caught a vibe today was lookin' crazy
[00:55.37]Money ran low right
[00:56.86]Felons can't vote right
[00:58.14]I can't even vote for who I believe in s**t ain't goin' right
[01:00.77]I didn't drop a tear inside the funeral I ain't mourn right
[01:03.31]And I nut in all the h*es I f**k I blame the p**n site
[01:09.52]Please don't turn away from me
[01:13.39]I got enough on my plate tryna turn away tryna turn away
[01:18.80]Became the voice of the streets and my people ain't believe in me
[01:24.37]I'm supportive of the streets and them people ain't believe in me
[01:28.37]Quarantine what
[01:28.83]I'm just tryna make a buck
[01:30.69]Talkin' to my dawg he be actin' like he stuck
[01:33.46]Favorite gun a Glock it slipped up what a month
[01:36.51]Throw it in they face every time I hold it up
[01:38.85]Granny ain't feelin' too well
[01:41.23]Shootout with the police I ain't goin' to jail
[01:43.65]How you actin' off a case you'll know if you tell
[01:46.27]I know a n***a from the hood he'll serve with no scale
[01:49.59]Watchin' Bands make a play I seen him score in the mail
[01:52.67]Gave him thirty-nine years I heard him cry in the cell
[01:55.34]Even though I'm gettin' big I bought a MAC through my Zelle
[01:58.10]Took a picture on my block they think I'm back in the field
[02:03.97]Please don't turn away from me
[02:08.27]I got enough on my plate tryna turn away tryna turn away
[02:13.70]Became the voice of the streets and my people ain't believe in me
[02:19.27]I'm supportive of the streets and them people ain't believe in me
data.trans:
[ti:The Voice (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Durk]
[al:The Voice (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.16]//
[00:00.32]//
[00:00.49]Turn Me Up Josh制作
[00:01.36]
[00:22.07]我独自承受那种痛苦
[00:24.09]我独自经历那个阶段
[00:25.95]我们都会改变 你说只有我变了
[00:28.08]长夜无眠 衣服都没怎么换
[00:30.18]你很清楚 你错了
[00:33.52]我很疲惫 他们没有意识到
[00:36.23]有些感觉就是很奇怪
[00:39.05]很多个夜晚让我痛苦不堪
[00:41.72]为什么他们要撒谎
[00:42.57]我爱我的朋友们
[00:44.36]你看起来很疯狂 我在贫民窟长大
[00:47.34]我是Durkio 但我是芝加哥的JAY-Z
[00:50.25]我害怕金钱会让我变成可怕的人
[00:52.75]我今天有一种感觉 看起来很疯狂
[00:55.37]钱越来越少了 对吧
[00:56.86]罪犯没有选举权 对吧
[00:58.14]我甚至无法选择相信谁 事情总是不对劲
[01:00.77]葬礼上我也没有流一滴泪 我没有一点哀愁
[01:03.31]我和这些女人做那事儿毫无顾忌 我觉得是那些网站的错
[01:09.52]请不要离我而去
[01:13.39]我有很多事情要面对 我不想面对
[01:18.80]变成了为街头发声的人 我的朋友却都不相信我
[01:24.37]我很支持街头兄弟 那些人却都不相信我
[01:28.37]隔离什么
[01:28.83]我只想挣钱
[01:30.69]和我的兄弟聊天 他表现得好像他被困住了
[01:33.46]最爱的枪是格洛克 结果出了问题 多难过的一个月
[01:36.51]每当我拿起枪来 就会把枪口对准他们的脸
[01:38.85]奶奶感觉不太好
[01:41.23]和警察枪战 我不要进监狱
[01:43.65]遇到官司你要怎么做 如果你告密 你就知道你会是什么下场了
[01:46.27]我认识一个街头兄弟 他买卖那种东西都不用秤
[01:49.59]看着Bands表演 我看到他买卖那种东西
[01:52.67]他被判了三十九年 我听到他在监狱里哭泣
[01:55.34]即使我越来越强大 我还是买了一把冲锋枪 以防万一
[01:58.10]在我的地盘拍了一张照 他们以为我重操旧业了
[02:03.97]请不要离我而去
[02:08.27]我有很多事情要面对 我不想面对
[02:13.70]变成了为街头发声的人 我的朋友却都不相信我
[02:19.27]我很支持街头兄弟 那些人却都不相信我
